vote.title: Authorize a construction contract for the construction of the Brownwood Park Erosion Control and Soccer Field Improvements Project located at 3400 Walnut Hill Lane - Quick Set Concrete, Inc., lowest responsible bidder of four - Not to exceed $275,089.35 - Financing: Park and Recreation Facilities (B) Fund (2017 General Obligation Bond Fund)
